scripts.check:deps: node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const lock=JSON.parse(fs.readFileSync('package-lock.json','utf8')); const pkgs=lock.packages||{}; const versions=new Map(); for(const pkg of Object.values(pkgs)){ if(!pkg||!pkg.name||!pkg.version) continue; if(!versions.has(pkg.name)) versions.set(pkg.name,new Set()); versions.get(pkg.name).add(pkg.version);} const dups=[...versions.entries()].filter(([_,s])=>s.size>1); if(dups.length){ console.error('Duplicate dependency versions detected:'); for(const [n,s] of dups){ console.error(n,[...s].join(', ')); } process.exit(1);} console.log('No duplicate dependency versions.');"
